welcome.para1: This page demonstrates the cryptographic protocol DP-3T used for decentralized app-based proximity tracing.

broadcastHistory.dayKeyPopover:
This key is a secret piece of information which is only used for the selected day to create EphIDs.

The day key is derived from the secret initial key by using a SHA256 hash function.

The day key for the selected person on the selected day:

description.para1Addition: for DP-3T, these are 96 EphIDs per day, and that for all days starting from the day of the key
